content: Involved in What? If you have to ask that stupid question, the answer is you have no reason to fucking live. Find your own fucking involvement. Do I look like the Shell Answer Man to you. WHY ARE YOU HERE. WHAT DO YOU VALUE. Taking up room. I see. Fuck you and fuck taking up room. Indifference is beneath contempt.
title: Involved in What?
